settings.question_faqs: What is One Percent for the Planet?
settings.answer_faqs:
Plum is proud, and humbled, to be part of One Percent for the Planet. Founded in 2002, 1% for the Planet has grown into a global movement of more than 1200 member companies in 48 countries, all donating at least 1% of annual sales to sustainability initiatives. In just over 10 years 1% for the Planet companies have given more than $100 million back to Blue. Watch this video on 1% for the Planet to learn more:




Please note: it‚Äôs 1% of sales, not 1% of profits!

settings.question_faqs: Can I recycle my Plum empties?
settings.answer_faqs: Under our #Empties4Good initiative, you can not only send your empties for recycling for free but you‚Äôll also receive shopping credits for your act of goodness. For every empty you send us, we'll reward you with Rs. 50 in shopping credits on plumgoodness.com! Know more about #Empties4Good here.

settings.question_faqs: Is your packaging biodegradable?
settings.answer_faqs:
Most of our packaging is RECYCLABLE, and we minimize the use of packaging, in general. We avoid plastics like SAN, ABS and PVC that are not eco-friendly. At present we don‚Äôt use use any special grade that is more biodegradable than conventional plastic - we are constantly looking for ways to do that. If you have ideas we can pursue, tell us!
We use PET, PP and PE in our packaging. We encourage you to reuse and recycle ‚Äì and not just packaging.

settings.title: Chamomile & White Tea
settings.description: Specifically designed with tropical weather in mind, our Chamomile & White Tea range combines the soothing properties of chamomile with the potent antioxidant properties of White Tea. The result: a skincare range that prepares, defends and revives skin that's exposed to the elements.

settings.title: Green Tea
settings.description: Great for oily, acne-prone skin.Rich in polyphenols, our certified organic green tea extracts are brimming with antioxidants that retard the acne formation process,and help maintain a clear and refreshed look on your face.Glycolic Acid in these products is a great housekeeper, gently removing dead cells and keeping skin healthy.

settings.title: Hello Aloe
settings.description: Skin care should be a treat and not something to be afraid of - especially if you have sensitive skin! Presenting Hello Aloe... a lovingly crafted range with oodles of calming aloe juice and skin-loving ingredients in thoughtful textures. Worry no more and let your skin say Hello to Aloe :)

settings.title: Bright Years
settings.description: Specialist skin care designed for ageing skin. Loaded with powerhouse botanical actives like plant stem cells, amino acids and AHAs. Smartly formulated at the goodness labs.

settings.question_faqs: What precautions should I take before sending back the empties?
settings.answer_faqs: Make sure the bottle is fully empty, washed and dried. Pack it securely so it doesn't break in transit.

settings.question_faqs: What can I send and not send?
settings.answer_faqs:
a. Send only Plum empties please (we are a beauty company, not recyclers ourselves)!
b. Send only plastic bottles or jars. Glass is safe enough to be discarded in trash.
c. Send only empties - not half-empties!
d. For sending Phy empties please drop a mail at hi@thephylife.com

P.S: We would love it if you could collect atleast 2-3 empties before you request a pick-up

settings.question_faqs: How does the pickup work?
settings.answer_faqs:
a. In case you wish to do it yourself, make sure you're ready with your empties, packed in a good quality box with the below address mentioned. You can reuse your Plum shippers!
b. If you want us to arrange a pick up for you, just drop in an e-mail to hello@plumgoodness.com with your complete address & contact number or whats app us on 75064-96604

settings.question_faqs: When & how will I receive my gift voucher?
settings.answer_faqs: You will receive your shopping credits worth Rs.50 in your inbox within 15 days from the day of pick up.

settings.question_faqs: Terms and conditions
settings.answer_faqs:
We request you to play fair. While we shall be happy to take back as much plastic as we can, we also have a business to run, and therefore:

a. We will take back all types of Plum empties, including caps, but gift vouchers will only be issued for empties received of PLASTIC BOTTLES OF FULL-SIZE PLUM EMPTIES - one per empty
b. No gift vouchers will be issued for part-items like caps, or for sample tubes and bottles (whether purchased or not)
c. Please do not send glass bottles as these can break during transit and cause injuries Cheers, be good!

settings.question_faqs: Do you ship outside of India?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we do ship outside of India. To place an order & get your plums delivered to your doorstep, shoot us an email at hello@plumgoodness.com

settings.question_faqs: Will I have to pay shipping charges on every purchase?
settings.answer_faqs: We offer FREE Shipping on all orders above a minimum order amount, which is notified from time to time. We also offer Cash-On-Delivery to many locations at no additional charge. You should consider the shipping rates shown at the time of check-out to be final.

settings.question_faqs: How soon after I place my order, are my products shipped?
settings.answer_faqs: Orders placed before 3PM are shipped same day, and orders received after 3PM are shipped next working day. In rare cases, we may take a little longer to ship your order. In case of any delay we will keep you informed.

settings.question_faqs: What is the transit time for all orders?
settings.answer_faqs: We ship Monday to Saturday, excluding public holidays. Transit time to locations depends on courier loads, local conditions and a variety of other factors, although we estimate a 2-4 day transit time in most cases.

settings.question_faqs: Which courier agency do you use for your deliveries?
settings.answer_faqs: To ensure that your order reaches you in the fastest time and in good condition, we only ship through reputed courier agencies. Our current panel of couriers includes Blue Dart, FedEx, Aramex, Delhivery, Ecom Express & DTDC. We pick the most reliable (and not necessarily the least expensive) shipping partner to each location.

settings.question_faqs: If I order multiple products in one purchase, will you ship them all together?
settings.answer_faqs: While we shall strive to ship all items in your order together, this may not always be possible due to product characteristics, or availability.Each order may be shipped only to a single destination address specified at the time of payment for that order. If you wish to ship products to different addresses, you will have to place multiple orders.

settings.question_faqs: Can I return the package at the time of delivery if I‚Äôm not satisfied?
settings.answer_faqs: If you believe that the product is not in good condition, or if the packaging is tampered with or damaged, before accepting delivery of the goods, please refuse to take delivery of the package, and call us on +91-750-649-6604 or send us an email at

settings.question_faqs: Will I get an invoice with each order I place?
settings.answer_faqs: Invoice will be emailed to the email address provided at the time of placing the order.

settings.question_faqs: What do I do if I need to customise my delivery terms?
settings.answer_faqs: We try our best to accommodate special requests (such as expedited delivery, delivery at certain times of the day, deferred delivery), but we cannot guarantee that these requests will be fulfilled by our courier partners. If you aren't sure, we encourage you to call us before placing your order.

settings.title: Wild Cherries & Kiwi
settings.description:
Capturing the volatile aromas and flavors of the antioxidant rich fresh wild cherries and the ultra hydrating kiwi seed oil, this range of body care products are the heavenly match of fun & care!

 Get transported to a fruity heaven like never before!

settings.title: Berry Sorbet
settings.description: Made with the vitamins and antioxidants loaded cold-pressed blackberry seed oil this range is all set to make your skin berry berry nourished! When products are made with so much care.. the more, the berrier :)

settings.title: Vanilla & Fig
settings.description: Why choose between the deliciousness of Vanilla and the goodness of Fig when you can have both? Get the true essence of vanilla and the Vit-C rich love of Fig to get skin your body will love!

settings.title: Love & Limone
settings.description: Come and experience the love, and limone, of the Amalfi coast with this range of products lovingly made using the all-round do-gooder i.e. lemon peel extract! You can never have too much zing in your life! :)

settings.title: Creme Caramel
settings.description: Real caramel and oodles of skin-friendly goodies topped off with just the right level of sweet caramelicious aroma. Your body won't stop thanking you! :)

settings.title: Vienna Coffee
settings.description:
Love your daily dose of coffee? Well then, you're going to fall in love with Vienna Coffee!
This Austrian beauty is no ordinary latte or cappuccino. It’s a power-duo of style and character. Start with double espresso, twirl in whipped cream, and top off with chocolate sprinklings. No-frills, strong, and sophisticated. Get the antioxidant-rich goodness of coffee along with an aroma so heavenly, you won't stop smelling yourself!

settings.question_faqs: What are the conditions?
settings.answer_faqs: Product must be returned within 7 days of receipt. We only accept returns where less than 1/3rd of the product has been used, and with the original packing materials, so that return transit is safe for our delivery partners. Return policy does not apply to free gifts and promotional merchandise. We reserve the right to not honour return requests that we determine to be fraudulent/malafide and the decision of Plum in this regard will be final. Lastly, this return policy is only valid for products purchased directly from plumgoodness.com

settings.question_faqs: What should I do if I want to return a product?
settings.answer_faqs: In the rare instance that you are unhappy with a product, simply drop us an email at hello@plumgoodness.com with your name, telephone number and a convenient time to call. One of our product advisors will call you to understand the issue better and provide you instructions on shipping the product back to us.

settings.question_faqs: How & when will you refund the amount?
settings.answer_faqs: We will process your request within 3 working days of receiving your product at our facility. The amount (less shipping & handling charges) will be refunded in the form of equivalent value store gift coupons that can be used on plumgoodness.com Please note that cash refunds will not be issued under any circumstances.

settings.question_faqs: How do I send the product back to you?
settings.answer_faqs: You do not need to worry. We will provide you easy instructions for safe packing and shipping.

settings.title: Editor‚Äôs Picks

settings.question_faqs: Are your products 100% natural?
settings.answer_faqs:
We maximize the use of natural and nature-derived ingredients in our products, but we‚Äôll be honest: our products are not 100% natural. Many brands group nature-derived chemicals, such as SLS, as ‚Äúnatural‚Äù because it is derived from coconut oil (just as an example). Nothing could be farther from the truth. We believe that the classification we‚Äôve followed is transparent ‚Äì in keeping with our values.

If we could make things 100% natural we make them, like our Angel Eyes Kohl Kajal, and Hello Aloe Caring Day Moisturizer. Science allows us to formulate great products that work, by combining the best of natural goodies and absolutely safe synthetic stuff, and we are practitioners of that science. We guarantee, however, that our products are 100% safe, and we stay away from even doubtful ingredients. You can read a full list of our natural, nature-derived and safe chemical ingredients, as well as the ingredients we avoid, here.

settings.question_faqs: Are your products suitable for sensitive skin?
settings.answer_faqs: We believe all of them are, and we especially keep in mind sensitive skin types while formulating. There's also acollection of the gentlest among the gentle products suitable for sensitive skin. However, it was always recommended for people with sensitive skin to patch test any new product on a small patch on their forearm before using them more widely.

settings.question_faqs: Are your products suitable for children?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. We avoid harmful and even doubtful chemicals, and therefore, our products are suitable for children above 3 years. However, for children below 3 years, we would generally recommend using specialist baby products.

settings.question_faqs: Are your products vegan / vegetarian?
settings.answer_faqs:
Yes. Our products are 100% vegan and vegetarian.

Plum is PETA certified. What does this mean?
A PETA certification means we are 100% vegan & cruelty-free, i.e. we don't use animal-derived ingredients & we don't test our products on animals. Guaranteed.

settings.question_faqs: What is the difference between herbal, natural and organic products?
settings.answer_faqs: You will find the answer in our blog post on this important topic

settings.question_faqs: You use SLES in your products. Is it safe?
settings.answer_faqs: SLES is a safe surfactant and unfortunately got is name sullied due to its close resemblance to SLS, a proven harsh surfactant and skin irritant. You can read about the differences here.

settings.question_faqs: You use Cocamide DEA in your products. Is it safe?
settings.answer_faqs: Cocamide DEA has been determined by US FDA to be safe for use in rinse-off products at concentrations less than 10%. You can read the CIR report here.

settings.question_faqs: You use Triethanolamine in your products. Is it safe?
settings.answer_faqs: Triethanolamine (TEA), and especially the applications we use them in, is very safe. You can find more information here.

settings.question_faqs: You use Phenoxyethanol in your products. Is it safe?
settings.answer_faqs: Absolutely. It is a safe, widely accepted preservative and a replacement for parabens, which are very iffy. Read our views on parabens here.

settings.question_faqs: For how long is each Plum product safe to use?
settings.answer_faqs: Once opened, use each product within 6 months to ensure you extract the most amount of goodness from it, however the unopened product will expire 2 years after the manufacturing date

settings.question_faqs: Are the fragrances used in Plum products safe to use?
settings.answer_faqs: Most of the fragrances used in our products are blends of synthetic, natural and nature-identical substances. We take care to ensure that the fragrances we use are compliant to EU & IFRA norms for ingredient safety. Additionally, our fragrances do not contain propylene glycol and phthalates, and are completely safe for regular use.

settings.title: Hibiscus & Rosemary
settings.description: Why be so rough with dandruff when you can get the loving care of Hibiscus & Rosemary? Brimming with phytochemicals, Hibiscus is well-known for its ability to nourish the scalp and keep it protected from oxidative stress. Rosemary, with its proven effect on dandruff, controls excess oil production thereby tackling dandruff before it even arises!

settings.title: Olive & Macadamia
settings.description:
Dry & damaged hair needs a different kind of lovin'... the kind that is lovingly created with olive & macadamia oils. 

Known for their hydration quotient high with their powerful combination of fatty acids, vitamins and phytonutrients, olive and macadamia oils are our favorite hair nourishing power duo. Bonus goodness: macadamia oil is great for calming those frizz, tangles, and dullness too!

settings.question_faqs: Do you ship outside India?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes! If you‚Äôd like to purchase Plum and are located outside of India, drop us a mail at hello@plumgoodness.com and we'll get back to you with the next steps.

settings.question_faqs: Can I gift wrap my purchases?
settings.answer_faqs: Goodness is for sharing! We would be delighted to gift wrap your order for you. Just select the gift wrap option on your shopping cart and optionally, add a note with your gift. We will take care of the rest! Depending on availability, you may also be able to pick prepacked gift baskets. Click here to explore current availability.

settings.question_faqs: When will I receive my order?
settings.answer_faqs: We ship same day or next business day of receiving your order. Shipping times in India are usually 1-4 business days. We apologize if you are facing a greater delay - let us know at hello@plumgoodness.com or call us at +91-750-649-6604.

settings.question_faqs: What do I do if I‚Äôm having trouble making payments online?
settings.answer_faqs: We have one of the most sophisticated and easy-to-use payment gateways installed on this website. Call us on +91-750-649-6604 if you are experiencing problems.

settings.question_faqs: I don‚Äôt like what I bought. Can I return it?
settings.answer_faqs: Plum offers a "no fuss" return policy for all products purchased on plumgoodness.com. Click here to know more

settings.question_faqs: Besides plumgoodness.com, where else can I buy Plum online?
settings.answer_faqs: In India, Plum is also available on amazon.in, flipkart.com, nykaa.com and purplle.com (list is constantly being updated). If you are from the trade and wish to sell Plum from your store, drop us an email at sales@plumgoodness.com or call us on +91-750-649-6604 and we can talk!

settings.question_faqs: Are Plum products available in retail outlets?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes! We are now present in 100+ retail outlets across all 4 corners of India. Find an outlet near you,here.

settings.question_faqs: How do I redeem my reward points?
settings.answer_faqs:
Just follow these simple steps to redeem your reward points:

1. Log into your account and click on ‚ÄúPlum Rewards‚Äù at the bottom left corner of the website

2. Once you‚Äôve clicked, click on ‚ÄúGET REWARDS‚Äù out of the options available

3. Select the amount you want to redeem from the available options (Rs. 50, Rs. 100 etc)

4. This will generate a discount code starting with "LL ...". Copy the entire code

5. Now make your purchase by adding to cart and then click on "Complete my Order"

6. At the checkout page, you will find a tab, under the address tab, asking for the discount code

7. Enter the copied code there and click on "Apply". Your total will reduce by the amount of the coupon

8. Enjoy all the Plum goodness :)

settings.question_faqs: How do I refer a friend and getting referral rewards?
settings.answer_faqs:
To refer a friend to Plum, simply log into to your account on plumgoodness.com, and click on Plum Rewards floating button on the bottom left of your screen. Navigate to refer-a-friend tab, where you can find instructions to invite by email, Facebook and Twitter. It's as simple as just sharing a link with your friends! They get 10% off their first purchase, you get 1000 reward points post delivery of your friend order.

As a security measure, points are added to your account 14 days after payment is realized on your friend's order.

settings.question_faqs: Do you have similar products for Men?
settings.answer_faqs: While all Plum products are good for use by men, we now have a dermatologically-tested, 100% vegan specialist grooming range for men called Phy.

settings.question_faqs: How do I join Plum Rewards?
settings.answer_faqs:
Anyone with an account on plumgoodness.com is automatically enrolled.
Don't have an account?Click here.
PS: It also helps you save on typing out your address each time!

settings.question_faqs: How do I view my point balance?
settings.answer_faqs: Your point balance is on every page in the bottom left of the page, provided you‚Äôre signed in. Simply click on the bar to gain instant access to manage your points. It's that simple.

settings.question_faqs: How do I earn points?
settings.answer_faqs:
You automatically earn points for every purchase, every friend referral, and on your birthday.
Purchases: Make sure you sign in to your account before making any purchases on plumgoodness.com, because you will earn 1 Plum point on every 1 Rupee you spend on plumgoodness.com.
Referrals: You can send a 10% off welcome voucher to a friend, and when they complete their first purchase, you get 1,000 Plum point as a referral reward!
Birthdays: Make sure to sign up to get 1000 reward points on your Birthday automatically!
Empties4Good: Once we receive your empties, you can be rest assured that you‚Äôll find 500 Plum reward points in your kitty soon enough!

Do note that points earned for various activities as well as their redemption values are subject to (upward and downward) changes, and we'll do our best to keep this information up to date on this page. You should always consider the balance shown in your Rewards account as final.

settings.question_faqs: How do I redeem my points?
settings.answer_faqs:
For every 10 points in your account, you can redeem 1 rupee as a gift voucher. So think of it as a 10% cash back! Select the tab called *Get Rewards* from your Plum Rewards panel. Here you‚Äôll see all the rewards we offer. If you have enough points, you can redeem them for a reward voucher instantly, which you can use for your purchase online.
Do remember that our store accepts only one coupon code per order. Shipping charges may be applicable in case your order value falls below the minimum required for free shipping. Learn more about shipping.

settings.question_faqs: How do I refer my friends?
settings.answer_faqs:
1. Log in to your account
2. Click on the "Plum
Rewards" floating bar 3. Click on "Refer Friends" and choose to share on Email, Facebook or Twitter!
Your friend(s) will get a 10% voucher automatically, and when they do make their first purchase, you get thank you reward points as well!

Please note that if your friends do not click the unique link that you send them, there's no way for us to know if they have indeed been referred by you. So make sure you have your friends clicking through your link.

settings.question_faqs: Will I receive my points immediately?
settings.answer_faqs:
No. As a security measure, points are added to your account after the following approval periods:
Purchases: 4 days after payment is realized
Referrals: 14 days after payment is realized on your friend's order

settings.question_faqs: Do Plum points expire?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. If you don't earn or spend any points in 12 months, they'll expire.
